title: JeromeTash
author: JeromeTash
content: What happened:  Exchange claims to have a partnership with Bestchange which is false. They also created and used sock puppet accounts to shill the suspicious exchange.This thread will act as a reference link for the trust flag against the exchangeScammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3514949Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419344Additional Notes: Sock puppet accounts involved: 1. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=35156462. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=35183263. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=35256554. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=35261845. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3531393

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: January 28, 2023, 10:37:40 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:01:50 PM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: They have live chat and I chat with one of their representatives to know more about their scamAnother lie:Code:Domain:crownchange.netRegistrar:REGISTRAR OF DOMAIN NAMES REG.RU LLCRegistered On:2022-10-13Expires On:2023-10-13Updated On:2022-10-14I do not know how an exchange would have a domain name just 2 months old to have been existing for many years, big lie.It is a scam exchange.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Not only do they claim to have a partnership to bestexchange but they also claim to have partnerships with some of the top exchange and online wallets in the industry.For them to have a partnership on these top exchange and online wallets in the industry they should have the Crownchange logo on their page also but it's unlikely they will be a partner in a two-month exchange, this alone give them away as a scam exchange, you never lie about your partnership.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: It is easy to buy a script and program it to look like this site. I remember seeing dozens of sites that have a similar interface, and therefore, with a low budget, the fraudster can create dozens of similar sites, and I expect that this is what he did.What will happen if we report these accounts?Wouldn't it be banned because it's spam. it was not created for the purpose of discussions, but rather to pump the topic.If there is someone in the Russian local board, with a little research they will find some similar platforms.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on January 29, 2023, 11:50:19 AMWhat will happen if we report these accounts?Wouldn't it be banned because it's spam. it was not created for the purpose of discussions, but rather to pump the topic..Not sure but there are high chances that they won't get nuked just like I have seen other bump accounts in ANN threads so I usually prefer tagging them incase the moderators don't do anything to the accounts

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on January 29, 2023, 11:50:19 AMIt is easy to buy a script and program it to look like this site. I remember seeing dozens of sites that have a similar interface, and therefore, with a low budget, the fraudster can create dozens of similar sites, and I expect that this is what he did.What will happen if we report these accounts?Wouldn't it be banned because it's spam. it was not created for the purpose of discussions, but rather to pump the topic.If there is someone in the Russian local board, with a little research they will find some similar platforms.Some of  the elements to make this platform a scam are here, fake partnerships, and newbies created to shill the announcement, since the thread and the platform is already reported it ends there is no need to do anythingbut it's good if DTs will tag these newbie accounts, I don't see the promoter and his bunch of shills will go back to pump their announcement now that they are exposed.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on January 29, 2023, 05:37:18 AMNot only do they claim to have a partnership to bestexchange but they also claim to have partnerships with some of the top exchange and online wallets in the industry.For them to have a partnership on these top exchange and online wallets in the industry they should have the Crownchange logo on their page also but it's unlikely they will be a partner in a two-month exchange, this alone give them away as a scam exchange, you never lie about your partnership.Archived: https://archive.ph/IHY9RYes, this is a scam exchange platform. They put these partnerships on their site to reassure investors that they are a legit exchange. It is good that they did not delete the reviews page on the CrownChange site. I have seen that 99% of the reviews written by their clients are negative. We must report to their domain registrar so that no beginner will fall victim to their hands.Most of the exchanges these days are like this, no team, no sufficient information, and no guarantees, it is a scam in a scam, so when trading or when depositing our funds, we must choose the exchange carefully so that our funds are not at any risk.

comments.author: puduf
comments.body: Great service, fast payment, support will always help. I recommend this exchanger for exchanging https://crownchange.net//ru/exchange-pmusd-to-xrp/

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: puduf on February 25, 2023, 12:05:18 PMGreat service, fast payment, support will always help. I recommend this exchanger for exchanging https://crownchange.net//ru/exchange-pmusd-to-xrp/This is a stupid attempt on your part to polish this scam platform, a newbie account without any posts and suddenly he wants us to believe that what he is trying to say is true.It seems that you are too stupid to come up with creative ways, so no one will believe you and you add more proof that the platform is scam.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on February 25, 2023, 01:22:32 PMQuote from: puduf on February 25, 2023, 12:05:18 PMGreat service, fast payment, support will always help. I recommend this exchanger for exchanging https://crownchange.net//ru/exchange-pmusd-to-xrp/This is a stupid attempt on your part to polish this scam platform, a newbie account without any posts and suddenly he wants us to believe that what he is trying to say is true.It seems that you are too stupid to come up with creative ways, so no one will believe you and you add more proof that the platform is scam.They think they can just create multiple accounts, make fake vouches and all of a sudden members will believe that they are not a scam. Scammers are dumb too, who knew  They have been creating shill account and posting in their ANN thread too. I am going to tag all of themHere is another oneQuote from: yardus on February 02, 2023, 12:42:22 PMI really liked this exchanger, the speed and exchange rate are on top. Support adequate! Thank you!

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: puduf on February 25, 2023, 12:05:18 PM~ Great! Now we have another confirmation that CrownChange is a scam.  Any service that uses sock puppet accounts to promote and vouch for its own product is most likely a scam. This is not just because it looks bad, but also because it makes the service appear untrustworthy. If you are looking for a way to make money online, I suggest that you find one that does not involve using scammy tactics like this.Nice find @JeromeTash! I supported the trust flag against @CrownChange.
